children: Paper cups with a small amount of liquid
Paper plates or cups labeled as “Compostable”
Uncoated (not shiny) paper plates (such as Chinet brand)
Dirty plates and cups with a shiny coating

The shiny coating on paper plates and cups is usually plastic. Scrape the coating with your fingernail or a knife. If wax collects under your fingernail, the coating is wax. Wax-coated cups and plates can go in your food waste bin.
